instructions: Go to your profile; tap the icon resembling a person in the bottom right-hand corner. Tap the three dots at the top right-hand corner. Access your settings . On iPhone, tap the gear icon to the right of your profile photo. On Android, tap the icon with the three small dots . Scroll down to the Notifications section and choose Push Notifications . Scroll down to the bottom, where you'll find the Video Chats section. Choose who you want to receive video chat notifications from, whether that's people you follow or everyone you've had a direct message conversation with on Instagram.
On iPhone, tap the gear icon to the right of your profile photo. On Android, tap the icon with the three small dots .
